svg.text: BC Gov AI Landing Zone - Full Stack Architecture
Adapted from Microsoft AI Landing Zone with Platform Landing Zone

g.text: Platform Landing Zone (Managed by BC Gov Central Cloud Team)
AI Application Landing Zone (da4cf6 - Shared by BC Gov Teams)
BC Gov Network → ExpressRoute → App Gateway → APIM → AI Services
(Clients do NOT connect directly to backend services)

svg.text: BC Gov AI Landing Zone - Full Stack Architecture | Adapted from Microsoft AI Landing Zones
